title: New: Sam Lynch – Mess You Made
body:
Love the intimacy to the songwriting here from **Sam Lynch**.

Anyone who has been in a messy, turbulent relationship can probably sympathise with large portions of the lyrics here; the sense of pointlessly fighting with someone, when all you want to do is the absolute opposite. Touches of Julien Baker and Phoebe Bridgers seep in at times, with Lynch’s real heart on sleeve songwriting. Check it out below.
